docs.lead_paragraph: Out on Long Island, between Flushing and Jamaica, is the New York Parental School, where the Board of Education is educating boys between the ages of twelve and fifteen who steadily refuse to attend school. The Parental School...

headline.main: BOYS TRANSFORMED IN PARENTAL SCHOOL; Wonder-Working Method of Handling Those Who Won't Attend Elsewhere. TURN OUT FINE, HEALTHY LOT While Learning Various Arts, and They Enjoy Many Fascinating Bucolic Pursuits.

docs.abstract: Principal J S Fitzpatrick tells of work accomplished
